title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.376 - Installation of plastic service lines by trenchless excavation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.376 - Installation of plastic service lines by trenchless excavation

State Regulations

Plastic service lines installed by trenchless excavation
must comply with the following: (a) Each operator shall take practicable steps to provide sufficient clearance for
installation and maintenance activities from other underground utilities or
structures at the time of installations. (b) For each pipeline section, plastic pipe
and components that are pulled through the ground must use a weak link, as
defined by section
255.3
of this Part, to ensure the
pipeline will not be damaged by any excessive forces during the pulling
process. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.376

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
